/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with trees and buildings, creating a harmonious blend of nature and architecture. The buildings are predominantly gray and brown, reflecting the urban landscape of Beijing. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a beautiful contrast to the earthy tones of the buildings. The image is taken from a street-level perspective, immersing the viewer in the scene and creating a sense of being there.
